title: Passionless Moments (1983 - Australia) [Jane Campion] drama
description:
Passionless Moments (1983 - Australia)

Short / Drama

directors and writers . . . . Jane Campion, Gerard Lee
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0086084/


Australian Film Institute - WON - Best Experimental Film

Passionless Moments is a lighthearted series of vignettes sharing people's fleeting thoughts. The film reveals a beautiful oddness in mundane situations, wanting to show sweet ordinary people that you rarely see on the screen. The film has a witty, detached ironic tone and a surreal focus on the ordinary detail of lives in suburbia.


Video: XviD, 640x480, 23.976 fps, 1473 Kbps, 00h11m56s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, joint stereo, 128 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, optional subtitles English, French, Italian, Spanish
